title: 安装竹mod后游戏崩溃 求解
author: 赤色彗星的逆袭
txt_content:
安装了竹mod后游戏运行崩溃 求解{:10_522:}

提示信息
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Slot 239 is already occupied by ic2.core.block.BlockITNT@11f5701 when adding ruby.bamboo.block.BlockBamboo@890b6f

求解啊

replies.author: 赤色彗星的逆袭
replies.txt_content: 忘记说了 游戏是1.5.1版本的

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: 方块ID冲突，建议修改竹的ID。

replies.author: 赤色彗星的逆袭
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2013-7-17 03:14 
方块ID冲突，建议修改竹的ID。
怎么修改啊

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
赤色彗星的逆袭 发表于 2013-7-18 02:36 
怎么修改啊
config文件夹内对应mod的配置文件
